Package org.drip.product.definition

Class BasketProduct

java.lang.Object
org.drip.product.definition.BasketProduct
All Implemented Interfaces:
BasketMarketParamRef
Direct Known Subclasses:
BondBasket, CDSBasket, ComponentPair
public abstract class BasketProduct
extends java.lang.Object
implements BasketMarketParamRef
BasketProduct abstract class extends MarketParamRef. It provides methods for getting the basketâ€™s components, notional, coupon, effective date, maturity date, coupon amount, and list of coupon periods.

  • Module = Product Core Module
  • Library = Fixed Income Analytics
  • Project = Product Components/Baskets for Credit, FRA, FX, Govvie, Rates, and Option AssetClasses
  • Package = Fixed Income Components/Baskets Definitions


Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
